_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The process of liberation [sn22.136:1.5]: Seeing the five aggregates as burning chaff
Growing disillusioned with the five aggregates
Understanding that rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.
